remarks: Value of operation ` F ` , mapping a vertex v and a nonnegative integer n to the "(For a fixed vertex v, let f(n) be the number of) walks from v to v of length n" according to definition 5 in [Huneke] p. 2. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Sep-2018.)
statement:
numclwwlk.c $e |- C = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` n ) ) $.
numclwwlk.f $e |- F = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( w ` 0 ) = v } ) $.
numclwwlkovf $p |- ( ( X e. V /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( X F N ) = { w e. ( C ` N ) | ( w ` 0 ) = X } ) $.
$d C n v w $.
$d C w $.
$d E n $.
$d N n v w $.
$d N w $.
$d V n v $.
$d X n v w $.
